review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately the place is not cleaned between guests. There were three different rooms in our party and all three had dirty sheets. The staff obviously don't care about cleaning them and openly said the previous guests had only stayed in the rooms 1 night. 

Friends of ours also lost there passports which they didn't notice until the next night. The called the property the next morning, and the property stated they thoroughly checked their room and they were not there. A week later the hostel said they cleaned the room and found the passports (this was too late as they had already cancelled their passports). This leads us suspicious that they didn't originally check the room, or clean the room until 7 days later.  Would not advise staying here. All other accommodations we stayed in during the Ha Giang loop were good apart from this.

review.comment_negative:
It was dirty. When we got in the room it was clear they hadn't cleaned the room after the previous guest had left. In fact, one bottle of water was already opened and the sheets of one of the two beds was crumpled and with several spots, the other had encrusted mucus on the sheets! When we asked for new sheets, they gave us other sheets but it was not clear if they were actually new (not good smell, spots etc.). In the end, we preferred to sleep inside of our sleeping bags.
The walls were also full of weird spots which made us feel quite uncomfortable.
The towels were tremendous, old and with several spots.
The bathroom was rusty and overall dirty.
